page.title: 08NEW SCHOOL IN MILTON KEYNES
page.content: Giffard Park County Combined School was open on 22.4.85. The opening was delayed by frozen pipes which had thawed and caused a flood. Giffard Park is the newest school in Milton Keynes. In the school there are 16 home bases but at the moment only 5 classes are being used. Each homebase has a floor area of about 40 square metres. They own 1 video, 2 televisions, 1 music centre, records and a computer called Link 480Z. The school is built by a canal and there is the threat of the canal banks breaking and part of the school flooding. Giffard Park School can hold 480 children but at the moment only 157 children go there. The school hours are 8.55 a.m. to 12.00 noon and 1.15 p.m. to 3.15 p.m.
